column1: '''Agar''' was the name for the town and the land in the story of [[Tal-Elmar (character)
column2: Tal-Elmar]]. On its location little information is given, except that it was a region of green hills, situated "three leagues away" from the shores of the [[Belegaer
column3: Great Sea]], and apparently closer to the ocean than the rival town of [[Udul]]. In a note near the end of the story there was a suggestion that the place was on the estuary of the [[Isen]] or perhaps the [[Morthond]].
